name: BeaverShock
description:
Description

Explosion woke up beaver Bob and he is confused. The forest's enviroment disappear and reappear from time to time. Some strange crystals and objects are everywhere. 

Explore the forest and find out what happened.

Designed for Ludum Dare 49. Theme: Unstable

Control

W, A, S, D / Arrow keys — Movement
E — Use objects
Esc, P — Pause

Team

sergio_nikol — team lead, code, game design, level design, Bob's voice

VoidN7 — code, game design, level design

Elena Mironova — game design, level design, asset managment

zhahongir_web — 2D Art
